alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:58AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Flagler, northeastern Nassau, St. Johns, northeastern Marion, Putnam, eastern Clay, Duval and southeastern Camden Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1158 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kingsland to Normandy to near Lake Delancy. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Palm Coast, St. Marys, Saint Augustine, Fernandina Beach, Palatka, Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Flagler Beach and Bunnell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
